lpool.network

Class Communication

  • java.lang.Object
    • lpool.network.Communication

  • public class Communication
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for handling a communication with a client, making sure it stays alive and managing the Receiver and Sender.
    Author:
    Gustavo

      • Communication

        public Communication(Network network,
                     java.net.Socket s,

        Constructor.

        network - The network this communication is associated to.

    • Method Detail

      • getSocket

        public java.net.Socket getSocket()
        Returns:
        The socket associated with this communication.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the communication. The socket is closed 1 second later to leave time for pending messages to be read.

      • isConnClosed

        public boolean isConnClosed()
        Returns:
        True if the connection is closed, false otherwise.

      • getClientCommEvents

        java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> getClientCommEvents()
        Returns:
        A queue with the messages received.

      • send

        Sends a message to this client.
